content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects O JOIN sys.schemas S ON O.schema_id = S.schema_id WHERE O.NAME = '[ProductModelProductDescription]' AND O.TYPE = 'U' AND S.NAME = '[ext]')
CREATE TABLE [ext].[ProductModelProductDescription]
	(
	 [ProductModelID] bigint,
	 [ProductDescriptionID] bigint,
	 [Culture] nvarchar(4000)
	)
WITH
	(
	DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
	 CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
	 -- HEAP
	)
GO

--Uncomment the 4 lines below to create a stored procedure for data pipeline orchestrationâ€‹
--CREATE PROC bulk_load_[ProductModelProductDescription]
--AS
--BEGIN
COPY INTO [ext].[ProductModelProductDescription]
(ProductModelID 1, ProductDescriptionID 2, Culture 3)
FROM 'https://adlgen2gradjhb.dfs.core.windows.net/dladventureworks/datalake/SalesLTProductModelProductDescription'
--END
GO

SELECT TOP 100 * FROM [ext].[ProductModelProductDescription]
GO
